Summary Note:
Binder Schmidt Maier and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
Binder Schmidt Maier is a 41 year old Senior Trader from Austria.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, he chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Binder Schmidt Maier and Heidi have been married since 2017. They are proud parents of 3 children: Huber, Gertrud and Schmid.
Education Background:
In 2002, Binder graduated from Bundesgymnasium und Bundesrealgymnasium Wien I with a secondary school diploma.
He then attended University of Salzburg, which he graduated in 2006.
Occupation History:
Binder Schmidt Maier is a 41 year old and comes from Austria.
At OMV AG, Binder Schmidt Maier held the position of Junior Trader from 2007 to 2009, developing essential skills in the field.
His subsequent role was as a Senior Trader at Gunvor Group, where he continued to grow professionally from 2009 till now.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 180000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Innsbruck and Vienna, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He inherited a significant sum of 7120000 EUR from his father, a respected Private Equity Manager, in 2013, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In summary, Binder has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
